pullRequest.title: KEYCLOAK-14137 Upgrade Authentication selector screen
pullRequest.bodyText:
edited related css and ftl theme resources
fixed affected tests

Signed-off-by: Peter Zaoral pzaoral@redhat.com
Cc: @mabartos @ssilvert @vmuzikar @drichtarik
Just a quick note - @mabartos's KEYCLOAK-14139 should be merged first. There probably will be a conflict with the stylesCommon paths in theme.properties but I will fix it easily just by accepting his version.

nodes.bodyText: @Pepo48 Could you please remove the zocial css? There is no need for that anymore. It may avoid some merge conflicts.

nodes.bodyText: I'm afraid I have to bug you a bit more with IE. It seems there's some overflow when the text is longer.

This is very subjective (as usually with UI stuff ;)) and it's definitely not a blocker but I think it looks a bit awkward that the blue border is just on top. Maybe it'd look better if it would be at the bottom as well? I don't know... Is there any PF4 best practice on this?
